alert.note: Alert for Greater Lake Tahoe Area; Lassen-Eastern Plumas-Eastern Sierra Counties; Mono (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Lake Wind Advisory issued May 27 at 2:48AM PDT until May 27 at 11:00PM PDT by NWS Reno
info.description: ...LAKE WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM THIS MORNING TO 11 PM PDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Southwest winds 15 to 25 mph with gusts 35 to 40 mph expected. Waves 1 to 3 feet, locally up to 4 feet on Lake Tahoe and Pyramid Lake. * WHERE...Pyramid, Lahontan, Rye Patch, Topaz, Bridgeport, Mono, Crowley, Lake Tahoe, Washoe, Walker, Donner, Fallen Leaf, Prosser, Boca, Frenchman, Stampede, Davis, and Eagle. * WHEN...From 11 AM this morning to 11 PM PDT this evening. * IMPACTS...Small boats, kayaks and paddle boards will be prone to capsizing and should remain off lake waters until conditions improve.
info.instruction: Check lake conditions before heading out and be prepared for a sudden increase in winds and wave heights. Consider postponing boating activities on the lake until a day with less wind.

area.areaDesc: Greater Lake Tahoe Area; Lassen-Eastern Plumas-Eastern Sierra Counties; Mono
